title: Universal Print: Print Support Application (PSA) on Windows 10
description:
Printer manufacturers are in the process of creating Print Support Applications (PSA) to add custom print finishing options and workflows, such as adding a watermark or accounting code to customize the print experience. PSA APIs are already available on Windows 11. This item will bring the power of PSAs to Windows 10 as well.Â To find available PSA use the supporting docs under More info link.
More info: https://aka.ms/upintegrations
